definition: general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50节图形设计免费课程将教授你大量的理论知识。

sentences.english: Kangkang said that he previewed the day's lesson before class.
sentences.chinese: 康康说他课前预习当天的课程。

sentences.english: Many schools around the country have adopted similar coursework.
sentences.chinese: 全国许多学校创立了相似的课程。

sentences.english: But just 9 percent of those who use M.I.T. OpenCourseWare are educators.
sentences.chinese: 但是只有9%使用麻省理工开放课程的网友是教育者。

sentences.english: You are only being examined on this semester's work.
sentences.chinese: 现在只考你在本学期学的课程。

sentences.english: CIPP evaluation pattern makes strong influence in the world.
sentences.chinese: CIPP是一种在国内外影响较大的课程评价模式。

sentences.english: In the beginning the training sessions were held at Volvo Trucks dealerships on Saturdays.
sentences.chinese: 最初的培训课程由沃尔沃卡车公司安排在周日进行。

sentences.english: So that's a brief overview of the courses.
Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升读青衣分校人力资源管理学高级文凭课程二年级。

sentences.english: My friend said he could always arrange his schedule around your schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我朋友说他可以根据你的课程表来调整他上课的时间。

sentences.english: Form-filling guides and the required courses for specialization could be found in the application form.
sentences.chinese: 填表说明及专业方向对应课程详见申请表。

sentences.english: And it is this belief that leads us to include these arts in the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 正是这个观点，我们将艺术襄括进了学校课程之中。

sentences.english: Second, I suggest you to take an additional course in some training center.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我建议你去培训中心上额外的课程。

sentences.english: What were your expectations before and after taking the course?
sentences.chinese: 您在学习这门课程前后曾有什么样的期望？

sentences.english: Senior middle school chemistry teaching should be conducted with the concept of new curriculum reform.
sentences.chinese: 高中化学教学需要用新课程改革的理念来统领。
